definitions.definition: To work together with others to achieve a common goal .
examples: Let's collaborate on this project, and get it finished faster.
Wikipedia is a website where anyone can collaborate .

definitions.definition: To voluntarily cooperate treasonably , as with an enemy occupation force in one's country.
examples: If you collaborate with the occupying forces, you will be shot.

main_definition: To work together with others to achieve a common goal .
secondary_definitions: To voluntarily cooperate treasonably , as with an enemy occupation force in one's country.
